faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Answers to common questions about our services
faqs.q1: How do I book a consultation?
faqs.a1: Use the 'Book This Service' button on the service detail modal or contact us via WhatsApp or email to request an appointment.
faqs.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.a2: We accept bank transfers and UPI. Payment details will be shared after you request a booking.
faqs.q3: Can I get a refund if I am not satisfied?
faqs.a3: Refunds are evaluated on a case-by-case basis. Please contact us within 7 days of the consultation.
faqs.a4: Yes â€” consultations are available via phone, WhatsApp, email, or video call.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.subtitle: Manage services, updates, and site data
admin.dataManagementDesc: Export, import, or reset your data. All changes are stored in browser localStorage. Note: Services and horoscopes are stored in code and cannot be edited from admin panel.
admin.noteText: This admin panel is client-side only. Data is stored in localStorage and not secure for production use. For a production site, implement server-side authentication and database storage. Services and horoscopes are stored in code at
admin.mustBeEdited: and must be edited directly in the code.
admin.manageUpdatesDesc: Add, edit, or delete news and announcements. Services are managed in code.
admin.postUpdate: Post a new update or announcement
admin.dataStorageText: Updates are stored in your browser's localStorage. Changes persist across sessions but are limited to this browser. Use the export feature to backup your data, and import to restore or transfer to another browser. Services and horoscopes are stored in code at
admin.accessSubtitle: Enter the PIN to access the admin panel
admin.securityText: This is a client-side authentication for demonstration purposes only. It is NOT secure for production use. For production, implement proper server-side authentication with encrypted credentials and session management.

about.title: About Our Astrology Services
about.description1: Welcome to Cosmic Insights, your trusted destination for authentic Vedic astrology services. With over 15 years of experience, our expert astrologers provide personalized guidance to help you navigate life's challenges and opportunities.
about.description2: We specialize in birth chart analysis, marriage matching, career guidance, and personalized horoscope readings. Our approach combines traditional Vedic wisdom with modern understanding to deliver accurate and actionable insights.
